title: CSP.guru
description: A database of concentrating solar power plants of the world for energy modellers and analysts.
long_description:
This datasets holds technical, economic, financial, and industrial data on all operating concentrating solar power stations and of stations under construction, and many demonstration plants as of 1. January 2023. For detailed description of the data collection procedure of CSP.guru, please see the original article [Lilliestam et al. (2017)](https://doi.org/10.1038/nenergy.2017.94).

## Data Package

We provide the data in form of a [tabular data package](https://frictionlessdata.io/specs/tabular-data-package/) that consists of a CSV (comma separated values) file holding the actual data and a single JSON file (`datapackage.json`) holding the metadata and an .xlsx file for quick analyses. 

## License and conditions

The licence of this data allows to share and adapt this data if you give appropriate credit, under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) license.

For academic and professional use (presentations, journal articles, reports, etc):if possible, please cite the source in which the present dataset was first used [Lilliestam et al. (2021)](  https://doi.org/10.1080/15567249.2020.1773580). Please also link to [www.csp.guru](https://www.csp.guru) if possible.

## Contact

For questions or issues get in touch with [Richard Thonig](mailto:richard.thonig@iass-potsdam.de).
## Acknowledgements
Funding for this version  came from the SolarPACES secretariat. Previous versions of csp.guru were funded by the European Research Council Consolidator Grant [DESERTECTION (grant number 313553)](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/106709_de.html) for version 2016-08-30; csp.guru versions 2018-05-14 and csp.guru version 2019-09-01 received support from the European Union Horizon 2020 research and innovation program [MUSTEC (grant agreement No 764626) ](https://cordis.europa.eu/project/rcn/211264_en.html).

## Archive

All versions of the CSP.guru dataset are archived at [Zenodo](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.1318151).

fields.name: Power_station
fields.description: Name of the CSP plant

fields.name: Local_spelling
fields.description: Name of the CSP plant in non latin letters

fields.name: OpenCSP_ID
fields.description: Unique identifier for future updates

fields.name: Country
fields.description: Country where the CSP plant is located

fields.name: Region
fields.description: Worldregion where the CSP plant is located

fields.name: Status
fields.description: Distinguishes if a CSP plant is operational or under construction

fields.name: Capacity_MW
fields.description: Nominal capacity of the turbine  in MW

fields.name: Expected_generation_GWh_per_yr
fields.description: Expected yearly power output GWh per year

fields.name: Capacity_factor
fields.description: Ratio of expected electrical energy output over a year to the theoretical maximum electrical energy.

fields.name: Technology
fields.description: Distinguishes CSP technologies: trough, tower, dish, and fresnel. Also we show ISCC and Hybrid plants.

fields.name: Hybridisation_capacity
fields.description: Capacity of non-CSP power sources. Oftentimes CSP generation is co-located or hybridised with other power sources including natural gas boilers, solar PV, biomass or wind power

fields.name: Hybridisation_ratio
fields.description: Capacity ratio of non-CSP power sources over CSP turbine capacity.

fields.name: Hybridisation_comment
fields.description: More explenation on the kind of hybridisation if any, as CSP generation is oftentimes co-located or hybridised with other power sources including natural gas boilers, solar PV, biomass or wind power

fields.name: Year_construction_start
fields.description: Indicates the year when construction started

fields.name: Year_operational
fields.description: Indicates the year of the first power output

fields.name: State_highest_administrative_level
fields.description: Geographical description of the location where the CSP plant is located. Member State or region.

fields.name: Province_County_medium_administrative_level
fields.description: Geographical description of the location where the CSP plant is located. Community or lower administrativ level

fields.name: City_lowest_administrative_level
fields.description: Geographical description of the location where the CSP plant is located

fields.name: Location_coordinates
fields.description: Location in longitude and latitude, to locate CSP plant on satellite data

fields.name: DNI_kWh_per_m2_per_yr
fields.description: Direct normal irradiance (DNI) in kWh/mÂ²/year, indicates the solar resource

fields.name: Total_cost_million_currency_non_deflated
fields.description: Construction cost in million local currency, non-deflated

fields.name: Cost_currency
fields.description: Indicates the currency used for total cost

fields.name: Currency_year
fields.description: Indicates the year of the financial closure of the project, or construction begin if no data was found. This is used for deflation and currency conversion (exchange rate currency-USD as 31 December of the Currency Year)

fields.name: Total_cost_million_USD2020
fields.description: Project cost deflated to USD 2020 using world bank deflators and currency conversion

fields.name: Specific_cost_USD2020_per_kW
fields.description: Specific cost of the CSP plant per kilowatt deflated to USD 2020

fields.name: LCOE_5_25_USD2020_per_kWh
fields.description: Levelised cost of electricity with 5% weighted average cost of capital and a 25 year payback period, capacity dependent O&M (1.5% of investment cost per year), deflated from Year_operational using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or construction then not deflated (assumed cost year 2020)

fields.name: Remuneration_currency_per_kWh
fields.description: Indicates the level of support(e.g. FIT or PPA) in currency per kWh, local currency in the year of first feed-in

fields.name: Support_currency
fields.description: Indicates the currency used for support payments

fields.name: Cost_year_remuneration
fields.description: Indicates the first year of payment of the support, or of grid connection (if no support)

fields.name: Remuneration_USD2020_per_kWh_deflated
fields.description: Remuneration USD2020/kWh, deflated from Cost_year_remuneration using the Worldbank's GDP deflator; if station under development or construction then not deflated (assumed cost year 2020)

fields.name: PPA_or_support_duration_yr
fields.description: Indicates the duration of PPA or feed-in tariff

fields.name: Support_scheme_type
fields.description: Distinguishes the type of support scheme (mainly feed-in tariff (FIT) or power purchase agreement (PPA; either negotiated or auction-based)

fields.name: Policy_support_scheme
fields.description: Name of the policy or law that provides the legal bases for policy support

fields.name: Concessional_funding_other_support
fields.description: Preferential loans and other beneficial financial incentives such as tax credits that enabled the project

fields.name: Land_area_whole_station_not_solar_field_km2
fields.description: Land used by the CSP station measured in square kilometers

fields.name: Developer
fields.description: Company that developed the project

fields.name: Developer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company that developed the project

fields.name: First_owner
fields.description: Owner of the CSP plant when it was commissioned

fields.name: First_operator
fields.description: Company operating the CSP plant when it was comissioned

fields.name: Electricity_generation_offtaker
fields.description: Offtaker for the power generated in the CSP plant, oftentimes partner of the PPA

fields.name: EPC
fields.description: Company responsible for engineering, procurement and construction of the CSP plant

fields.name: EPC_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company responsible for engineering, procurement and construction of the CSP plant

fields.name: HTF_manufacturer
fields.description: Company delivering the heat transfer fluid to the plant

fields.name: HTF_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company responsible for delivering the heat transfer fluid to the plant

fields.name: HTF_medium_or_product
fields.description: Indicates the chemistry used to transport heat from the solar collector to heat storage or turbine

fields.name: HTF_category
fields.description: Four categories of HTFs: air, water, salt, thermal or organic oils

fields.name: Steam_turbine_manufacturer
fields.description: Company delivering the steam turbine to the plant

fields.name: Steam_turbine_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company responsible for delivering the steam turbine to the plant

fields.name: Turbine_model
fields.description: Specific model of the steam turbine

fields.name: Turbine_thermodynamic_cycle
fields.description: Information on the thermodynamics of the steam turbine. Cycles include steam rankine, organic rankine, and stirling cycles

fields.name: Power_cycle_pressure_bar
fields.description: Technical parameter of the turbine

fields.name: Turbine_efficiency_percent
fields.description: Describes the efficiency of the turbine as a percentage of the peak performance.

fields.name: Heat_exchanger_manufacturer
fields.description: Company delivering the heat exchanger to the plant

fields.name: Heat_exchanger_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company responsible for delivering the heat exchanger to the plant

fields.name: Cooling_type
fields.description: Indicates if the turbine uses wet or dry cooling

fields.name: Energy_storage_type
fields.description: Technology used for heat storage. Often two tanks for hot and cold molten salt

fields.name: Storage_capacity_hours
fields.description: Storage capacity in full load hours of the project Capacity_MW

fields.name: Storage_description
fields.description: More information on the thermal energy storage system

fields.name: TES_engineering_company
fields.description: Company that developed the heat storage system of the plant

fields.name: TES_engineering_company_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company that developed the heat storage system of the plant

fields.name: Solar_receiver_manufacturer
fields.description: Company that developed and built the solar receiver system of the plant

fields.name: Solar_receiver_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company that developed and built the solar receiver system of the plant

fields.name: Solar_receiver_model
fields.description: The model or type of the receiver

fields.name: Tower_height_m
fields.description: Technical property of solar receiver towers: the height of the solar tower in meters

fields.name: Number_of_heat_collecting_elements_for_trough_and_fresnel
fields.description: The number of HCE tubes in trough and fresnel type CSP plants

fields.name: Receiver_inlet_temperature_Celsius
fields.description: Technical parameter of the solar receiver in degrees Celsius

fields.name: Receiver_outlet_temperature_Celsius
fields.description: Technical parameter of the solar receiver in degrees Celsius

fields.name: SCA_or_heliostat_manufacturer
fields.description: Company manufacturing the solar collector assemblies (SCA) or Heliostats. Not necessarily the same company that developed the design

fields.name: SCA_or_heliostat_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company manufacturing the solar collector assemblies or heliostats

fields.name: SCA_or_heliostat_engineering_or_IP_owner_company
fields.description: Company that designed the solar collector assemblies (SCA) or Heliostats. Not necessarily the same company as the one that manufactured them

fields.name: SCA_or_heliostat_engineering_or_IP_owner_company_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company that designed the solar collector assemblies or heliostats

fields.name: SCA_or_heliostat_model
fields.description: Name or model of the heliostat or solar collector

fields.name: Reflector_mirror_manufacturer
fields.description: Company that manufactured the solar mirrors

fields.name: Reflector_mirror_manufacturer_country
fields.description: Country of origin of the company manufacturing the solar mirrors

fields.name: Reflector_model
fields.description: The model or type of the mirror

fields.name: Solar_mirror_area_m2
fields.description: The aperture area of the mirrors in squaremeters

fields.name: Solar_multiple
fields.description: Solar multiple approximation of mirror field to turbine size. Normalized with SM 1 = 6000m/MW

fields.name: Number_of_heliostats_or_dishes
fields.description: Number of distinct heliostats or dishes

fields.name: Mirror_area_per_heliostat_or_dish
fields.description: the aperture area of the heliostat mirrors in square meters

fields.name: Fresnel_line_width_m
fields.description: The width of the line of a fresnel type CSP plant in meters

fields.name: Fresnel_number_of_lines
fields.description: Technical parameter of fresnel type CSP plants: the number of fresnel lines

fields.name: Fresnel_line_length_m
fields.description: Technical parameter of fresnel type CSP plants: the length of the fresnel lines in meters

fields.name: Trough_solar_collector_area_m2
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the aperture area of the trough solar collector assemblies (SCA) in squaremeters

fields.name: Trough_SCA_length_m
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the length of the trough solar collector assemblies (SCA) in meters

fields.name: Trough_number_of_loops
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the number of loops

fields.name: Trough_number_of_modules_per_SCA
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the number of modules per solar collector assembly (SCA)

fields.name: Trough_number_of_SCA
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the number of solar collector assemblies

fields.name: Trough_number_of_SCA_per_loop
fields.description: Technical parameter of trough type CSP plants: the number of solar collector assemblies per loop

fields.name: Construction_jobs_years
fields.description: Employment during construction in job-years

fields.name: Annual_operations_jobs
fields.description: O&M jobs

fields.name: Additional_sources_relative_to_2019_version_of_cspGURU_and_NRELSolarPACES_as_of_31_January_2020
